alert.note: Alert for Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 04 at 1:00PM PDT until November 09 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SUNDAY TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 feet. Isolated amounts of 4 feet of snow above 8000 feet. Westerly winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Yosemite NP outside of the valley and Upper San Joaquin River. * WHEN...From 4 PM Sunday to 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for significant reductions in visibility with near whiteout conditions at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley
